xmlText.p: First Period_1, New Jersey, Stafford 7 (Johansson), 8:01. 2, Washington, Connolly 11 (Orpik, Oshie), 12:10. Penalties_Vatanen, NJ, (delay of game), 2:12; Beagle, WSH, (tripping), 18:31.

Second Period_3, New Jersey, Greene 3 (Vatanen, Hall), 3:33. 4, New Jersey, Wood 12 (Hischier, Vatanen), 10:55. 5, Washington, Orlov 6 (Chiasson, Beagle), 11:09. Penalties_Severson, NJ, (tripping), 3:46; Boyle, NJ, served by Wood, (instigator), 8:33; Wilson, WSH, Major (fighting), 8:33; Boyle, NJ, Major (fighting), 8:33; Boyle, NJ, Misconduct (misconduct), 8:33; Ovechkin, WSH, (slashing), 14:26; Zajac, NJ, (holding), 16:37.
Third Period_6, Washington, Connolly 12 (Wilson, Kuznetsov), 16:12. Penalties_Zajac, NJ, (interference), 8:09; Chiasson, WSH, (tripping), 11:47.
Power-play opportunities_Washington 0 of 5; New Jersey 0 of 3.
Goalies_Washington, Holtby 24-9-1 (32 shots-28 saves). New Jersey, Kinkaid 7-3-2 (19-16).
Referees_Jake Brenk, Dan O'Rourke. Linesmen_Greg Devorski, Matt MacPherson.
